## Bio

Matt Albar is an industrial-organizational psychology practitioner. He is
passionate about making the working experience better for everyone. He has a 
wide breadth of experience in HR functions, including recruitment, personnel
selection, assessment, talent development, onboarding, compliance, compensation
& benefits, and coaching. He partnered with many internal and external clients
to conduct many different types of analyses to improve organizational processes.
